Directions

This simulation models the decomposition of propanol and the resulting mole and mass balances. Use the setpoint displays to control the reactor temperature and drag the dial to adjust the flowrate. Use switches to turn things on or off, and the three-way valve to purge or collect measurements. Use the bubble meter by squeezing the bulb until the detergent creates a bubble, then monitor its changes over time. Scroll to zoom and drag the screen to pan.
